display.title: Enchanter's Crystal (Attribute)
display.description: Crystalised power of the world, basic in design simply providing bonus Attributes to an Item. Alternatively it can be used to increase the tier of another Enchanter's Crystal in a Enchanter's Crucible [Required: 1x Attibute Enchanter's Crystal 1x Uncommon or Epic Enchanter's Crystal | Drop Craft With: Enchanter's Crucible]
